testcase.name: Create Successful Accounting Report
testcase.skipped: Given Go to login page......................................................passed When Input email "user2@keisan.jp"..........................................passed And Input password "12345"..................................................passed And Click button login......................................................passed Then Display username "user2"...............................................passed Given Go to URL.............................................................passed When Click button Create Business Plan......................................passed And Input Data No "QLDS2"...................................................passed And Input Data title "DEHAでQUANのテストデータ".....................................passed And Input Company name "DEHA Software"......................................passed And Select business category................................................passed And Input Remarks "This is test data from DEHA's QA.".......................passed And Select Period unit......................................................passed And Select Period...........................................................passed And Input start date of business period "2019/01/02"........................passed And Select currency unit....................................................passed And Select Currency.........................................................passed And Input author "Quan Le"..................................................passed And Input Registration date "2019/01/02"....................................passed And Input abstract "Made by DEHA Software.".................................passed And Click button save and return............................................passed Then Display message successfull "事業計画が作成できました".............................passed And Display accounting report with data no "QLDS2"..........................pending
